name: Rewindev
description:
Hello there, Falex2000 here!

Rewindev it's a soft rage platformer game, which you will be involved in an adventure with rewind time powers. Also, at the same time you will experience a simple rewinded history about how a videogame is developed :D!.

This game was developed for the brackeys 2020.2 GameJam, this is my firt jam, i'm a mexican begginer in game develop

Have fun :3

I had problems with the game in browser :'(, but it is available for download the EXE version :D
